column4: is there a software based reason my ps/2 mouse would stop working? how can i troubleshoot it?
it worked then stopped as you were using it? or how exactly?
It had been working. then it stopped. i didn't change any configuration (that i know of)
thing is, I need to use a KVM switch with PS/2 between computers
try the mouse without the kvm. those things are notarious for causing issues...
